name: chainner
description: A modular interactive flowchart based image processing GUI

scripts.preinstall: cd frontend && npm i && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && python run.py"
scripts.start: cd backend && pyinstaller run.py --onefile && cd ../frontend && npm start
scripts.build: cd backend && pyinstaller run.py --onefile && cd ../frontend && npm run make
scripts.publish: cd backend && pyinstaller run.py --onefile && cd ../frontend && npm run publish
